scripts.start:web: cd apps/web-app && f() { bun run dev -- "$@"; }; f
scripts.start:web:standalone: trap 'kill 0' EXIT; f() { bun run start:server "$1" & bun run start:web -- ${2:+--port $2}; }; f
scripts.start:desktop:standalone: trap 'kill 0' EXIT; bun run copy:server && LUNATIX_STANDALONE=1 ./scripts/desktop-run.sh dev
scripts.build:desktop:standalone: bun run build:server && bun run copy:server && bun run build:desktop
scripts.build:all-release: bun run config:release && bun run build:server && bun run build:web && bun run build:desktop
